title: How to Calculate Your Weight in Stones

steps.title: Find your weight in pounds.
steps.content: Find your weight in pounds. Pounds are the U.S. standard unit for measuring mass or weight. [2] X Research source Most standard scales in the U.S. will weigh you in pounds, including scales at your doctor’s office, and personal scales you can buy. For example, you might weigh 165 pounds.

steps.title: Divide your weight in pounds by 14.
steps.content: Divide your weight in pounds by 14. One stone is equal to 14 pounds. So dividing pounds by 14 will give you your weight in stones. [3] X Research source For example, 165 14 = 11.79 {\displaystyle {\frac {165}{14}}=11.79} . So, 165 pounds is about 12 stone. Specifically, it is 11 stone, 11 pounds, since 165 divided by 14 is 11, with a remainder of 11.

steps.title: Convert stones to pounds.
steps.content: Convert stones to pounds. To do this, you need to do the opposite of what you would do to convert pounds to stones. That means you need to multiply the number of stones by 14. If the weight is given in the number of stones and pounds, multiply the number of stones by 14, and add the pounds to the product. Otherwise, just multiply the whole number or decimal by 14. [4] X Research source For example, to convert 10 stone, 8 pounds, you would calculate: 10 × 14 + 8 {\displaystyle 10\times 14+8} = 140 + 8 {\displaystyle =140+8} = 148 {\displaystyle =148} So, 10 stone, 8 pounds is equal to 148 pounds.

steps.title: Find your weight in kilograms.
steps.content: Find your weight in kilograms. Kilograms are a standard metric unit for measuring mass. People around the world use kilograms to measure weight. For example, you might weigh 70 kilograms.

steps.title: Multiply your weight by .15747 {\displaystyle .15747} .
steps.content: Multiply your weight by .15747 {\displaystyle .15747} . One stone’s weight is 15.747 percent of 1 kilogram. So multiplying the number of kilograms by .15747 will give you your weight in stones. [5] X Research source For example, 70 × .15747 = 11.0229 {\displaystyle 70\times .15747=11.0229} . So, 70 kilograms is about 11 stone.

steps.title: Convert stones to kilograms.
steps.content: Convert stones to kilograms. To do this, you need to do the opposite of what you would do to convert kilograms to stones. So, you would divide the number of stones by .15747. [6] X Research source 4 For example, to convert 9 stone to kilograms, you would calculate 9 .15747 = 57.15 {\displaystyle {\frac {9}{.15747}}=57.15} . So 9 stone is about 57 kilograms. steps.title: Convert Chet’s weight in pounds to weight in stones.
steps.content: Convert Chet’s weight in pounds to weight in stones. Chet weighs 174 pounds. Divide the weight in pounds by 14: 174 14 = 12.43 {\displaystyle {\frac {174}{14}}=12.43} . So Chet weighs about 12 stone. You can also calculate 174 ÷ 14 = 12 , R 6 {\displaystyle 174\div 14=12,R6} . So specifically, Chet weighs 12 stone, 6 pounds.

steps.title: Convert the weight of metric ton into stones.
steps.content: Convert the weight of metric ton into stones. A metric ton is 1,000 kilograms. [8] X Research source Multiply the number of kilograms by .15747: 1 , 000 × .15747 = 157.47 {\displaystyle 1,000\times .15747=157.47} . So a metric ton is about 157 stone.

steps.title: Find the number of pounds that is equivalent to 8 stone.
steps.content: Find the number of pounds that is equivalent to 8 stone. There are 14 pounds in a stone, so multiply the number of stones by 14: 8 × 14 = 112 {\displaystyle 8\times 14=112} . So, 8 stone equals 112 pounds.
